title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2014 - Medellin, Colombia
description:
Coderetreat is a day-­long, intensive practice event focusing on the fundamentals of software development and design.  
You can find out more information about the day on the 2014 global day announcement (http://archive.coderetreat.org/profiles/blogs/announcing-global-day-of-coderetreat-2014).
